functions: As the Full Stack engineer for a remote physiotherapy application

Utilizing NextJS and Tailwind, I designed a user-friendly interface for physiotherapists to record patient conversations seamlessly. With Python and FastAPI,
As the Full Stack engineer for a remote physiotherapy application
I spearheaded the development of an innovative AI agent voice-to-text note-taking platform by leveraring open AI framework.
Utilizing NextJS and Tailwind, I designed a user-friendly interface for physiotherapists to record patient conversations seamlessly. With Python and FastAPI,
Developed 5 fragments, 10 views and 10 viewModels using MVVM and Kotlin Jetpack compose
Added 5 directions towards new fragments in the navigation file
Successfully made 3 API calls with Swagger API provider with DAO and repository patterns
Augmented new users visits by 35% by ensuring SEO indexation by creating static pages at built time for all of the website’s 15 pages with GraphQL queries in Typescript by using Gatsby’s plugin
Added 5 new meta data on each page by leveraging Gatsby Head API
Increased new users visits counts by 25% by harnessing Gatsby’s Script and Hubspot API in order to collect data on user behaviors such as the number of visits

Built a CLI tool in Python that validates 100% of all different types of schema and value errors of customers personalized job templates files in yaml or json format and developed the front-end using Typescript
Implemented 2 commands (run&execute) with user parameters as inputs job template using TDD in Pytest and unit tested all 8 functions using internal tools like brazil and peru
Configured the required files with AWS CodePipeline in order to deploy the tool in the rendering service
Enhanced user’s interface clarity on the main page by refactoring the visuals of 7 different messages in different Swift components
Upgraded the UI of the account’s page by adding 5 new visual components by using Swift UI library and Figma
Performed Swift code reviews alongside mobile team and worked in Agile
Automated 2 commands by fabricating 2 CI/CD pipelines in Python yaml in the Fly Concourse environment
Ensured the validity of the pipelines by debugging and using fly concourse commands in PowerShell
Incentive the company’s comprehension of risk mitigation from cyber threats by publishing new OWASP policies
Automated repetitive purchase order tasks by creating 15 automated tests in X++ using Microsoft Visual Studio
Ensured the performance and the validity of the tests with Microsoft Dynamics 365
Secured data integrity of the automated tests by using SQL commands in Microsoft SQL
